summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Richmond Acres; Plat of Lake Dell; Homecroft Addition to Seattle; southwest quarter of Section 21, Township 26 North, Range 4 East; Central Seattle; 3rd Avenue South; and, southwest quarter of Section 10, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
